creditline: Gift of the Alfred K. Moir Trust
description: abstracted image of a horse seen from back, galloping; large, blocky body; head partially out of picture plane
provenance: The artist, New Orleans ('before 1962; gave/sold to Moir); Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (before 1962-d. 2010; bequeathed to Condos); Barbara Moir Condos, Chevy Chase, Maryland (2010-12); given to MIA by Alfred Moir Trust, 2012.
title: Study of a Galloping Horse from Behind
